attributes.action: make Law to be a struggle by logic from first principles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This might more be considered Sharia than Western law, if along the lines of Anglo-Saxon Common Law.
At the same time any cultural case law hould be considered as suspect.
While representative democracy may be rejected in the modern world - as much as contrarilly the Royal Mail workers want to go on strike against broadband as a simmilar threat to custom and practice, to observe attentional voting efficiencies with institutionalised parties as compound personalities need not be incompatible with custom if representatives offer lectures in the chamber.,
Grouped and individual voting on positions taken in funded lawmaking discussions concerning dependant and exclusive positions might be hardware supportable in coming years and should not be ruled out as a development of western democracies applicable to Islamic cultures,

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
